summary: Customer Success Advocate with a strong technical background and hands-on experience across Windows, Linux, and macOS, networking, and productivity tools. Skilled at assisting diverse customers, resolving issues, and coordinating with cross-functional teams in high-volume live chat and ticket environments. Proficient with PC hardware, AV equipment, antivirus software, and basic programming.
skills: Linux distributions (Ubuntu, Linux Mint, CentOS, Red Hat)
Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher, Project, Lync/Live Meeting)
Instant messaging: Microsoft Lync, Skype for Business, Yahoo Messenger, Facebook Messenger, Google Hangouts
Video conferencing: Google Hangouts, Skype, ooVoo
Email clients: Outlook, Gmail, Apple Mail
Mounting/configuring televisions, audio equipment and security systems
Introductory programming: Python, PHP, JavaScript, HTML
Mobile device email and Lync access

experience.title: Customer Success Advocate
experience.description: Support multiple customers via live chat; monitor chat and ticket queues; escalate tickets/chats to tier II support when needed.

experience.title: Technology Support Specialist
experience.description: Oversee classroom operations; install, maintain and upgrade computer hardware, peripherals and software in Central/Southern NAU Extended Campuses region; troubleshoot with users via Lync, telephone, email, and in person; install/upgrade antivirus; support distance education; maintain and create documentation; coordinate with NAU ITS; configure Active Directory; manage imaging using Ghost; install projectors and lab equipment.

experience.title: Install Technician
experience.description: Installation of televisions, audio and security equipment; wiring/cabling; mounting televisions and speakers; set up wired/wireless networking; run cables throughout office/home.

experience.title: Hardline Merchandiser / Electronics Associate
experience.description: Merchandising electronics and assisting customers; maintaining displays and product knowledge.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Information Technology
